page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: Most of the area round{Braco }is farm land. There are 15 farms in our D block.The farms on the lower ground grow crops - barley,potatoes,turnips,rape,hay and peas. Some of the {barley}is used for malting. After it is cut the barley is dried in a shed. Then a man comes to take a sample for testing.If the barley is in good condition it is collected for malting.If it is not good enough it is used for feeding. This happened last summer because the weather was hot and dry.The barley straw can be used for bedding made into feed by chopping it up and mixing it with molasses, or it can be burnt.
